title: Rescue by helicopter
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Australia. Royal Australian Navy and Bern Gandy
brief_description: Standard procedures for rescue by a helicopter. Vertical take off and landing, and the ability to hover make it a valuable rescue craft. Shows correct method of approach, putting on the rescue strap, and giving the winding signal. Provided rules are adhered to helicopter rescue is quite safe. Edited by Richard Mitchell.
